item.description:
The Western MA Developers Group is an informal group of local software developers that meet every other Thursday for food and tech chat. People in the group come from a variety backgrounds (desktop software, web development, microcontrollers, etc) and languages (Python, Java, PHP, C++, Clojure, .NET langs, etc). Talk ranges from job war stories and programming topics to movies, gadgets, phone apps and whatever else people want to talk about.

More information here (calendar in the bottom right corner of the page):
http://wmassdevs.com/...

----

Note: The location and format of the meeting have changed. It is now on King Street in Northampton instead of Panera's and has a semi-structured format. Please see the blog for more information.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western MA Developers' Group
